string.name: tutorial_0
string.value: welcome to the tutorial.

string.name: tutorial_1
string.value: use keys/swipe and hold to move around.

string.name: tutorial_2
string.value: well done!

string.name: tutorial_3
string.value: press space/tap to push blocks.

string.name: tutorial_4
string.value: defeat enemies by crushing them with blocks.

string.name: tutorial_4b
string.value: remember, you can change controls in the & menu.

string.name: tutorial_5
string.value: now, exit the room by using the door at the bottom.

string.name: tutorial_6
string.value: good luck!

string.name: hint_0
string.value: defeat enemies to charge your spell button.

string.name: hint_1
string.value: collect gems to increase your exp level.

string.name: hint_2
string.value: collect all the letters to form the word wizard.

string.name: hint_3
string.value: the bigger the avalanche the higher the points amount.

string.name: hint_4
string.value: every wizard has a unique magic spell.

string.name: hint_5
string.value: collect all the pages of the almanac.

string.name: skill_0
string.value: collected gems increased of 10% at the end of each level -

string.name: skill_1
string.value: invulnerable to fire flames -

string.name: skill_2
string.value: doesn't slow down inside the water -

string.name: skill_3
string.value: game bosses have one energy less -

string.name: skill_4
string.value: doesn't drift on ice tiles -

string.name: skill_5
string.value: invulnerable to magic attacks -

string.value: best time

string.name: level_clear
string.value: level clear

string.name: continue
string.value: tap to continue..

string.name: shop_2
string.value: thanks - come again!

string.name: hero_name_11
string.value: fox lady

string.name: skills_1
string.value: tap a skill

string.name: skills_5
string.value: +1 life

string.name: skill_help_1
string.value: increases minions stun time

string.name: skill_help_2
string.value: increases speed of your wizard

string.name: skill_help_3
string.value: increases magic's charge speed

string.name: skill_help_4
string.value: adds one life

string.name: go
string.value: go !!

string.name: panel_purchase_ok
string.value: purchase successful.

string.name: panel_purchase_bad_1
string.value: not enough coins.

string.value: reset game

string.name: reset_line_0
string.value: are you sure?

string.name: reset_line_1
string.value: resetting the game will remove all your progress permanently

string.name: intro_string_1
string.value: it is the lantern festival and all people are gathered.

string.name: intro_string_2
string.value: tanuki is guarding the village,

string.name: intro_string_2b
string.value: when a lightning strikes the nearby shrine.

string.name: intro_string_3
string.value: removing the protection charm from an old jar.

string.name: intro_string_4
string.value: oh no! the evil spirits are freed.

string.name: intro_string_5
string.value: 'i am tatarigami and i bring sorrow and destruction!'

string.name: intro_string_6
string.value: will you defeat all the pesky yokai and save the festival?

string.name: ending_0_string_1
string.value: tanuki successfully sealed tatarigami back into the old jar.

string.name: ending_0_string_2
string.value: the lantern festival shall now continue!

string.name: ending_1_string_1
string.value: after defeating the yokais the ninja mysteriously disappears,

string.name: ending_1_string_2
string.value: getting ready for his next stealth mission.

string.name: ending_2_string_1
string.value: kitsune collected his money prize for defeating the yokais.

string.name: ending_2_string_2
string.value: -ha ha! i'm the smartest fox ever existed!-

string.name: ending_3_string_1
string.value: after defeating tatarigami mia decided to stay at the village for a while,

string.name: ending_3_string_2
string.value: enjoying the relaxing hot springs.

string.name: ending_4_string_1
string.value: panda heads back to the bamboo forest,

string.name: ending_4_string_2
string.value: where she can relax and eat as much bamboo as she wants!

string.name: ending_5_string_1
string.value: the giant bear has proved to be even stronger than the evil yokai tatarigami.

string.name: ending_5_string_2
string.value: -roar!! i'm the king of the mountain!-

string.name: ending_6_string_1
string.value: sumo master is now the guest of honor at the lantern festival,

string.name: ending_6_string_2
string.value: and he's treated with some delicious sushi. yum yum!

string.name: ending_7_string_1
string.value: now that the yokais are gone cactus can continue his journey,

string.name: ending_7_string_2
string.value: trying to find his lost mom.

string.name: ending_8_string_1
string.value: the samurai successfully re-established his power,

string.name: ending_8_string_2
string.value: and he's about to rule over the village, imposing heavy taxes to all villagers.

string.name: ending_9_string_1
string.value: skull-boi heads back to town,

string.name: ending_9_string_2
string.value: chasing his dream of becoming a famous rapper!

string.name: ending_10_string_1
string.value: the blue kappa returns to his swamp,

string.name: ending_10_string_2
string.value: being treated by the villagers with fresh cucumbers every day!

string.name: ending_11_string_1
string.value: fox lady didn't really care about saving the villagers,

string.name: ending_11_string_2
string.value: all she wanted was to make sure the forest remained safe and protected.

string.name: ending_12_string_1
string.value: the lantern festival was too loud and crowded for baburu,

string.name: ending_12_string_2
string.value: so he decided to leap back into the water and enjoy a deep sleep.

string.name: ending_13_string_1
string.value: gionathan woke up from his dream,

string.name: ending_13_string_2
string.value: and realized he still had to fix bugs before shipping his last videogame.

string.name: ending_14_string_1
string.value: looks like pinguino is fleeing from someone,

string.name: ending_14_string_2
string.value: i wonder who that might be?

string.name: ending_15_string_1
string.value: after her victory, pinguina became very famous and influential,

string.name: ending_15_string_2
string.value: convincing leaders of the world to sign an agreement against global warming.

string.name: ending_16_string_1
string.value: alex found all the lost bells,

string.name: ending_16_string_2
string.value: and he's now ready to head back to the neko house.

string.name: ending_17_string_1
string.value: after defeating the evil yokais laal is invited to stay at the village,

string.name: ending_17_string_2
string.value: where he's now treated like a king.

string.name: ending_18_string_1
string.value: after his victory firo is unable to control his excitement and goes on a fire spree,

string.name: ending_18_string_2
string.value: setting the whole village on fire.

string.name: ending_19_string_1
string.value: looks like ico is chasing someone,

string.name: ending_19_string_2
string.value: i wonder who that might be?

string.name: ending_20_string_1
string.value: despite being very shy franco built up enough confidence,

string.name: ending_20_string_2
string.value: and asked the shop lady out for a date.

string.name: ending_21_string_1
string.value: mummy received the key of the giant pyramid from laal,

string.name: ending_21_string_2
string.value: so he could return to his secret chamber.

string.name: ending_22_string_1
string.value: despite being half human and half beast, werewolf gained the respect of the other animals,

string.name: ending_22_string_2
string.value: who accepted him as one of them and to live in the bamboo forest.

string.name: ending_23_string_1
string.value: tatarigami was no match for the powerful succubus,

string.name: ending_23_string_2
string.value: long live the new queen of all yokais!

string.name: ending_24_string_1
string.value: vampire stayed up all night to fight the yokais,

string.name: ending_24_string_2
string.value: catching a terrible cold. time to tuck in!

string.name: credits_line_1
string.value: published by

string.name: credits_line_2
string.value: game by

string.name: credits_line_3
string.value: code and gfx

string.name: credits_line_5
string.value: fdg staff

string.name: credits_line_9
string.value: project manager

string.name: credits_line_10
string.value: qa manager

string.name: credits_line_11
string.value: qa assistants

string.name: credits_line_12
string.value: qa team

string.name: credits_line_13
string.value: special thanks

string.name: boss_name_4
string.value: yuki onna

string.name: shop_welcome
string.value: welcome to the market.

string.name: shop_rare
string.value: rare secret item.

string.name: shop_3
string.value: walk into an item to equip it.

string.name: oldman_0
string.value: visited rooms tend to spawn less coins.

string.name: oldman_1
string.value: luck increases the rate of coins being spawned.

string.name: oldman_2
string.value: line up star blocks to get a lot of coins.

string.name: oldman_3
string.value: stand on the ? symbol to get infos about the item.

string.name: oldman_4
string.value: have you played super cat tales 2?

string.name: woodcutter_0
string.value: wild boars can jump over a block. watch out!

string.name: woodcutter_1
string.value: don't wait too long in a visited room or death will appear.

string.name: woodcutter_2
string.value: have you played snow kids?

string.name: woodcutter_3
string.value: don't touch the blue onibi fires floating around.

string.name: woodcutter_4
string.value: be sure to always check the map.

string.name: fisherman_0
string.value: i'm after the legendary giant catfish onamazu.

string.name: fisherman_1
string.value: walking into deep water will slow you down.

string.name: fisherman_2
string.value: some yokais cannot step into deep water.

string.name: fisherman_3
string.value: there are some nice hot springs nearby.

string.name: fisherman_4
string.value: be sure to equip a rare item, if you can.

string.name: graveyard_0
string.value: i.. dig.. grave.

string.name: graveyard_1
string.value: yokai.. no good.

string.name: graveyard_2
string.value: saw.. giant.. skeleton.

string.name: graveyard_3
string.value: graveyard.. no safe.

string.name: oldwoman_0
string.value: do you spare anything warm to drink?

string.name: oldwoman_1
string.value: ha ha! i love snowy nights.

string.name: oldwoman_2
string.value: i'm oshiroi baba.

string.name: oldwoman_3
string.value: are you scared by my appearance?

string.name: oldwoman_4
string.value: my straw hat broke.

string.name: master_0
string.value: i can control the fire element. ha ha!

string.name: master_1
string.value: i forge powerful katanas inside the volcano.

string.name: master_2
string.value: some yokais leave a fire trace. don't step on it.

string.name: master_3
string.value: i was supposed to go to the lantern festival.

string.name: master_4
string.value: remember, not all yokais are evil.

string.name: book_title_page_0
string.value: chochin obake

string.name: book_text_page_0
string.value: some old paper lanterns turn into a chochin obake. this yokai rarely causes harm and prefers to just scare humans instead.

string.name: book_title_page_1
string.value: blue ghost

string.name: book_text_page_1
string.value: blue ghost seen nearby villages and forests.

string.name: book_title_page_2
string.value: hitotsume kozo

string.name: book_subtitle_page_2
string.value: one eyed boy

string.name: book_text_page_2
string.value: child-like mischievous yokai, seen in dark streets where they surprise people.

string.name: book_title_page_3
string.value: daruma doll

string.name: book_text_page_3
string.value: old wooden doll that got possessed by a spirit.

string.name: book_title_page_4
string.value: bamboo sprout

string.name: book_text_page_4
string.value: bamboo sprout turned into a yokai by mannendake.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_5
string.value: neck lady

string.name: book_text_page_5
string.value: ordinary lady by day that extends her head far from her body at night to look for food.

string.name: book_text_page_6
string.value: wild boar mostly found in bamboo forests.

string.name: book_title_page_7
string.value: koi carp

string.name: book_text_page_7
string.value: carp found in ponds, sometimes out of the water.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_8
string.value: muddy monk

string.name: book_text_page_8
string.value: old monks covered in mud roaming rice fields.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_9
string.value: water goblin

string.name: book_text_page_9
string.value: yokai with frog-like skin, a beak, and a turtle shell on its back. known to sometimes drown people.

string.name: book_title_page_10
string.value: purple ghost

string.name: book_text_page_10
string.value: purple ghost seen nearby graveyards and forests. smarter than the blue ghost.

string.name: book_title_page_11
string.value: yonaki ishi

string.name: book_subtitle_page_11
string.value: giant boulder

string.name: book_text_page_11
string.value: moving stones possessed by spirits, known to cry at night.

string.name: book_text_page_12
string.value: skeleton of a former villager, found in graveyards. known to surprise and attack humans.

string.name: book_title_page_13
string.value: karasu tengu

string.name: book_subtitle_page_13
string.value: crow yokai

string.name: book_text_page_13
string.value: yokai resembling a crow, wearing a robe and flying high in the sky.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_14
string.value: elemental yokai

string.name: book_text_page_14
string.value: flame found in roads, paths, and forests. originated from a campfire left unguarded.

string.name: book_title_page_15
string.value: blue oni

string.name: book_text_page_15
string.value: demon-like spirit with blue skin and one horn. known to chase and attack humans with a big club.

string.name: book_title_page_16
string.value: red oni

string.name: book_text_page_16
string.value: demon-like spirit with red skin and two horns. usually wearing a tiger skin loincloth.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_17
string.value: hurry up enemy

string.name: book_text_page_17
string.value: death waits in the dark, suddenly appearing to harvest your soul.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_18
string.value: raccoon dog

string.name: book_text_page_18
string.value: guardian of the village's shrine. tanuki sometimes wears a straw hat.

string.name: book_text_page_19
string.value: specialized in espionage and deception, deemed dishonorable by the samurai.

string.name: book_text_page_20
string.value: magic fox respected by all villagers. their favorite food is fried tofu.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_21
string.value: human wizard

string.name: book_text_page_21
string.value: respected teacher of magic arts. she came to visit the village on holiday.

string.name: book_text_page_22
string.value: big and peaceful creature. panda is often seen nearby rivers of the bamboo forest.

string.name: book_text_page_23
string.value: powerful creature with strong brute force. bear is known to protect the forest.

string.name: book_text_page_24
string.value: sumo master, owner of the gym of the village. known to love sushi.

string.name: book_text_page_25
string.value: plant born in nugget canyon. no one knows what's the purpose of his journey.

string.name: book_text_page_26
string.value: powerful warrior belonging to an aristocratic family trying to take control over the region.

string.name: book_text_page_27
string.value: peaceful undead skeleton known to love music and big metropolis.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_28
string.value: water goblin

string.name: book_text_page_28
string.value: this kappa grew up alongside a human family, in a pond nearby their house.

string.name: book_title_page_29
string.value: fox lady

string.name: book_subtitle_page_29
string.value: forest elf

string.name: book_text_page_29
string.value: fox lady is not seen very often and many mysteries surround her. she lives in the bamboo forest.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_30
string.value: bufoid wizard

string.name: book_text_page_30
string.value: most of his time is spent training and meditating. known to emerge from the ocean just when his help is needed.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_31
string.value: indie dev

string.name: book_text_page_31
string.value: human game developer, spends most of his time programming and creating pixel art.

string.name: book_text_page_32
string.value: accountant at a popsicle factory. never missed a day of work.

string.name: book_text_page_33
string.value: activist doing her best to save the planet and the environment.

string.name: book_text_page_34
string.value: lives inside the neko house. always willing to help others and on the look for bells.

string.name: book_subtitle_page_35
string.value: human wizard

string.name: book_text_page_35
string.value: wizard from ramal town. laal can control the fire element and loves spicy food.

string.name: book_text_page_36
string.value: firo loves to melt ice blocks. rather dangerous when goes berserk.

string.name: book_text_page_37
string.value: playful dragon often shooting huge snowballs that inflict damages to the target.

string.name: book_text_page_38
string.value: the result of an experiment. despite his appearance franco is a kind soul.

string.name: book_text_page_39
string.value: this mummy was discovered inside the giant pyramid next to ramal town.

string.name: book_text_page_40
string.value: human with the ability to shapeshift into a wolf. loves hiking during nights of a full moon.

string.name: book_text_page_41
string.value: human-like demon appearing in dreams of her victims, seducing them.

string.name: book_text_page_42
string.value: often seen nearby the castle of guldburg, this vampire is known to oversleep and don't wake up at midnight.
